parameters.definition: Maximum proportion of transport vehicles that can be cars
Minimum number of people that need transport

description: A village hosts a banquet and provides bike and car transportation for everyone. A bike can take \param{BikeCapacity} people while a car can take \param{CarCapacity} people. Since cars are more expensive, at most \param{MaxCarProportion} of the vehicles can be cars. If the village needs to transport at least \param{MinPeople} people, how many of each vehicle should be used to minimize the total number of bikes needed?
